description: The ASCAT Wind Product contains stress equivalent 10m winds (speed and direction) over the global oceans. The winds are obtained through the processing of reprocessed scatterometer backscatter data originating from the ASCAT instrument on EUMETSAT's Metop satellite.
title: ASCAT L2 12.5 km Winds Data Record Release 1 - Metop

providers.name: European Organisation for the Exploitation of Meteorological Satellites (EUMETSAT)
